greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(ludic(n)) = lucky(1+a(n-1)), a(nonludic(n)) = unlucky(a(n)), where ludic(n) = n-th ludic number A003309, nonludic(n) = n-th nonludic number A192607 and lucky = A000959, unlucky = A050505.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8587
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Related or similar permutations: A237427, A255422, A257726, A257731.
Differs from A257731 for the first time at n=19, where a(19) = 203, while A257731(19) = 63.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 06 2015
